[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-lrucache](./harp-lrucache.md) &gt; [LRUCache](./harp-lrucache.lrucache.md) &gt; [set](./harp-lrucache.lrucache.set.md)

## LRUCache.set() method

Inserts or updates a key/value pair in the cache.

If the key already existed in the cache, it will be updated and promoted to the most recently used item.

If the key didn't exist in the cache, it will be inserted as most recently used item. An eviction of the least recently used item takes place if the cache exceeded its capacity.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
set(key: Key, value: Value): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | Key | The key for the key-value pair to insert or update. |
|  value | Value | The value for the key-value pair to insert or update. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
